concept.title: Customer Record Sources
concept.shortdesc: The Customer Record Sources page displays the attributes uploaded from your customer resource management or other third-party database. Attributes can include age, gender, loyalty level, products own, interests, and Lifetime Value, and so on. You can leverage this data for reporting, segmentation, activities, and campaigns.

conbody.p: You can upload the attribute data via FTP to the Marketing Cloud, then leverage the data for reporting, segmentation, activities, and campaigns.
